summary: This document is a TRUINTEL Supervisor Rounds log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, covering the dates August 9-10, 2019. It records routine security checks performed by lieutenants at various stations within the facility, including the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and a suicide watch room, in the days immediately preceding Jeffrey Epstein's death.

events.title: Supervisor Rounds at MCC
events.description: Lieutenants conducted routine security rounds at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, logging checks at various stations including the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and suicide watch room.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The log documents security rounds at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 9-10, 2019.
Rounds were conducted in areas including the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and a suicide watch room, which are relevant to inmate monitoring protocols.
The document was generated on August 11, 2019, the day after the last logged rounds and the day Jeffrey Epstein was found deceased in his cell.
The log is part of the TRUINTEL system, indicating it is for intelligence and supervisory tracking within the Bureau of Prisons.
No specific inmates or staff members are named in this excerpt; it only records workstation IDs and check times.
